articles.title: Crowned Shield Zamazenta Raid Guide - Pokémon GO Hub
articles.description: Crowned Shield Zamazenta is a Tier 5 legendary raid boss in Pokémon GO and it can be shiny! You will not be able to catch the Crowned Shield form of Zamazenta, and will instead encounter the Hero of Many Battles form of Zamazenta. This can be form changed int…

articles.title: The Nintendo Summer Sale Has Rare Discounts on Mario Switch Games Today - IGN
Facebook is starting to feed its AI with private, unpublished photos - The Verge
articles.description: Facebook users opting to upload their photos for “cloud processing” are inadvertently giving Meta AI access to their entire camera roll, including photos that have not been uploaded to Facebook’s servers.

articles.title: This Week’s Sex Diary: The Lawyer Who Called Off Her Wedding Two Weeks Ago - The Cut
articles.description: Every week, the Cut’s ‘Sex Diaries’ column features a new sex and dating story from an anonymous city dweller. This week, a 27-year-old New Yorker wonders if the co-worker she was having an affair with still wants to see her.

articles.title: After 27 years, engineer discovers how to display secret photo in Power Mac ROM - Ars Technica
articles.description: Developer solves mystery of hidden JPEG from the beige G3 era.
